alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 16 at 9:57PM EDT until May 17 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 226, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA NORTHAMPTON IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL VIRGINIA BRUNSWICK MECKLENBURG IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA CITY OF EMPORIA GREENSVILLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANTE, BRUNSWICK, BRYANTOWN, BUFFORD CROSSROADS, CHASE CITY, CLARESVILLE, CLARKSVILLE, COWIE CORNER, DURAND, EAGLETOWN, EDGERTON, EMPORIA, EMPORIA AIRPORT, EMPORIA RESERVOIR, GARYSBURG, GASTON, GREEN PLAIN, GUM FORKS, LAWRENCEVILLE, RICH SQUARE, SOUTH HILL, TRIPLET, VALENTINES, VULTARE, AND WHITE PLAINS.
